body: Can you create a new macro that call # define REGISTER_KERNEL(type) TF_CALL_SYCL_NUMBER_TYPES(REGISTER_KERNEL) in a central location and also make sure that the new macro undefines REGISTER_KERNEL when it's done. That will avoid a lot of boilerplate code.
